0: I wanna tell the whole world about a friend of mine
1: This little light of mine and I'm finna let it shine
2: I'm finna take yall back to them better times
3: I'm finna talk about my mama if yall don't mind
4: I was three years old, when you and I moved to the Chi
5: Late December, harsh winter gave me a cold
6: You fixed me up something that was good for my soul
7: Famous homemade chicken soup, can I have another bowl?
8: You work late nights just to keep on the lights
9: Mommy got me training wheels so I could keep on my bike
10: And you would give anything in this world
11: Michael Jackson leather and a glove, but didn't give me a curl
12: And you never put no man over me
13: And I love you for that mommy can't you see?
14: Seven years old, caught you with tears in your eyes
15: Cuz a nigga cheatin, telling you lies, then I started to cry
16: As we knelt on the kitchen floor
17: I said mommy I'mma love you till you don't hurt no more
18: And when I'm older, you ain't gotta work no more
19: And I'mma get you that mansion that we couldn't afford
21: Highly capable, lady that's makin loot
22: A livin legend too, just look at what heaven do
23: Send us an angel, and I thank you (Hey Mama)
24: Forrest Gump mama said, life is like a box of chocolates
25: My mama told me go to school, get your doctorate
26: Somethin to fall back on, you could profit with
27: But still supported me when I did the opposite
28: Now I feel like it's things I gotta get
29: Things I gotta do, just to prove to you
32: Give me a verse of "You, Are So Beautiful To Me"
33: Can't you see, you're like a book of poetry
34: Maya Angelou, Nikki Giovanni, turn one page and there's my mommy
35: Come on mommy just dance wit me, let the whole world see your dancing feet
36: Now when I say Hey, yall say Mama, now everybody answer me (Hey Mama)
37: Tell your job you gotta fake em out
38: Since you brought me in this world, let me take you out
40: Imma get you a jag, whatever else you want
41: Just tell me what kind of S-Type Donda West like?
42: Tell me the perfect color so I make it just right
43: It don't gotta be Mother's Day, or your birthday
44: For me to just call and say (Hey Mama)
title: Hey Mama
